startups.name: Aportemos
startups.product_desc:
Aportemos provides you the tools to Crowdfund Initiatives with the advantage of communicating on a social network environment. 
Our goal is to be the meeting point for everyone interested in building a better future and the place to raise money for the Causes that inspire you.
Our main focus is to bring growth to all nonprofit and civil organizations through direct donations of our users. 
Organizations, people and businesses create projects to build commitments with the idea of promoting win-win relationships by making social branding.

startups.name: Instacanvas
startups.product_desc:
Instacanvas is the new easy way to customize your interiors space with murals and canvas prints.

We are targeting the mexican market as it's an almost virgin market for those products.

We aim to recreate a Canvaspop model in Mexico, offering top quality Canvas Prints, and Printed Murals.

We have a lot of experience in the area since we have run a digital printing company for the 4 past years. We know very well the production and logistic part. 

We are aware that our business model will only work with a perfect website.

startups.name: Dig-e-Kart
startups.product_desc:
It is an app developed for saving time when you are on a busy schedule. Everytime you visit your local market you can scan the barcode of products you usually buy or you could eventually buy. The app will get a thumbnail of the product, description, price and availability on determined market you select nearby. 
You can pre-order your groceries from the comfort of your coach or while commuting on the bus, or simply  any time you wish! pre-pay the items with your credit/debit card and just go to the store and pick all the items already packed for you. You can also order them to your door for an extra charge. Buying the groceries will take only minutes and you will skip that awful long lines at the supermarket. You get that time to spend with your friends or family, or studing for that math exam!  The app will "learn" what similar products you can buy and suggest (upon request). We will make enjoy your experience with a flawless, intuitive interface!

startups.name: Printoo
startups.product_desc: Printoo lets you print your favorite photos directly from your smartphone and receiving to your door home absolutely free. ItÂ´s free because we add advertising and coupons behind your photos. So forget to looking for a place where you can print your baby, pets, party or your last travel photos.

startups.name: Beneficlix
startups.product_desc:
Beneficlix allows sponsors to exchange advertising for donations to wellfare, through supporters "beneficlixters" who also earn points "benefipoints" watching promotional videos, filling surveys up, and playing advergames.

Beneficlix charges a fee per each transaction. The success comes from making the donation process viral through social networks. 

The platform enables people to easily log in, watch the videos, earn points, publish their status on facebook, and invite other people to do the same thing.

startups.product_desc:
Feel Events is a mexican company that helps event organizers create better experiences with technology and art. Also we invest in events that have a proven track record.

- 23 events
- 800,000 attendes.

The company was sold to the leader of the market here in Mexico for an undisclosed agreement.

startups.name: Talentia
startups.product_desc:
Talentia is a SaaS platform that allows companies, organizations and entrepreneurs build their own online universities to share their knowledge with the world. 

Companies, organizations and entrepreneurs can start an online university with no lines of code; it's as simple as setting up your university's branding, giving your instructors permissions and start publishing your online courses with video lessons, files, communication and activities, all in one place. 

If you wish, you can charge for this courses and make a business out of it, give them for free as internal training for your company or make them part of your social impact initiatives by sharing the knowledge with the world.

startups.name: Galt Energy
startups.product_desc:
Galt Energy is a complete photovoltaic installer in that it offers leasing, financing, procurement, installation, monitoring and warranties for solar systems. 

Galt manages its own fund for leasing and financing operations and invests in technology to reduce financing risk. Moreover, it has developed friendly platforms to enable anyone to quickly refer clients or distribute product. 

Galt has created two different brands targeting different segments, from personalized installation and service to retail and distribution products. 

These tools have allowed the company to grow greater than 200% YoY. Galt Energy employs more than 20 people in its second year of operations and is now expanding operations to 5 other states in Mexico.

startups.name: GENIOS EN LINEA
startups.product_desc:
Genios en Linea is an online platform that offers online tutoring for kids, to help them solve their homework, study for an exam, or have extra lessons, between a certified community of tutors that connects in real time, through video conferences. 
Parents doesn't have enough time as they would like to help their kids with their homework, private tutors are expensive and it gets complicated to take your child to the lessons in rush hours, receive a tutor in your home also demands time and presence, with Genios en linea you take the plan that better fits your kid needs and follow their activities and advances through your mobile.
Our value proposition offers an innovative way to solve a problem many parents suffer with a secure, easy and friendly platform that allows parents and students connect and interact with our tutors community.
For our tutors is also a great extra income, with a flexible schedule that adjusts to their availability.
startups.high_concept: Disrupting the way of making homework

startups.name: Apuestale MX
startups.product_desc:
We are Latam's first social betting platform. 

Allowing users to socialize around sporting events with pre/post interactions.

It has the social element of a 1vs1 bet, with the security of an online platform and the stimulus of a social network.

startups.name: Naranya Labs
startups.product_desc: Naranya Labs is the global leading mobile commerce startup accelerator. We are part of Naranya, the biggest mobile commerce company in Latin America. We provide funding, support, and resources to startups aiming at high growth economies.

startups.name: Livdomo
startups.product_desc: We are evangelizers of the Internet of Things, we believe it should be universally accessible and simple to empower your life with technology. And that's were we come in! We have networked with several IoT companies and startups to help them promote and get their products to the end consumer, while we provide a one-of-a-kind service for each of our customers allowing them to obtain this technologies with financing options that allow them to get a home automation system for their homes from $0 USD to almost the price of a Coke and some Lays a day.
startups.high_concept: Technology empowered living, IoT for everyone

startups.name: Woo-Hoo Studios
startups.product_desc:
Woo-Hoo Studios' mission is to engage families through new learning experiences. 

We recognize that children have their own learning style and we look forward to accompany families in that experience throughout activities, games, books and videos.

Our content aims to initiate a conversation between parents and children about important topics in the development of their creativity, emotional and cognitive skills.

startups.name: Acacia Smart Venture
startups.product_desc: Acacia Smart Venture is a Mexican (Financial Institution) Venture Capital Firm with more than US$300 Million in capital under management. The firm was founded in 2014 and invests in Small Business, Construction Developmnet, IT and CleanTech companies. Acacia has offices in Mexico and Hong Kong.

startups.name: Mobkii
startups.product_desc:
We created Akii app for iOS. 
This app lets users know what's near them:

Exact latitude/longitude
Nearby tweets
Nearby instagram photos
Nearby foursquare venues
Save places so you can see whats going on in that places.


We are lookin for funding since we want to make this app better, and we have a strategy for marketing the app.

startups.name: Wirewatt
startups.product_desc: Wirewatt is an integrated web platform that offers solar installers and distributors tools to quote, design systems, create investor-grade proposals and manage their sales process. This is done by embedding our proprietary standard-based algorithms, energy savings risk models, and building energy consumption datasets into the platform, creating an easy-to-use software that delivers instantaneous investor ready proposals to our users. Wirewatt then connects proposals and helps capital providers eliminate risk. In this way, lenders receive a stream of qualified energy saving project finance opportunities and vendors do more projects.
startups.high_concept: Online marketplace connecting the capital markets to energy projects in Mexico.

startups.name: Kaibots
startups.product_desc: Kaibots is a new concept of remote controlled toys. The idea is to take the MMO games mechanics to real life robots, a level system and a battle system, along with characters and a back story.

startups.name: Alladinn
startups.product_desc:
Alladinn is the new advertising media with the power of the web 2.0 
Alladinn intends to reach the cupons niche as a more affordable solution for companies who wants to sell or advertise a specific product or service, but instead of disposing the ad when the campaign finishes, in Alladinn, the business stays positioned so people can find them even if they don't have any offers at the moment.

Also there are other services we offer, like newletter, videos and image design. Plus we have other projects we will like to try in the future regarding advertising.

startups.name: Twitt2Go
startups.product_desc: Twitt2go is a web-based platform that lets +500 million users order products online without having to leave Twitter; all they have to do is register once to be able to order from any participating goods and services provider with delivery, pick-up and/or reservations service. Twitt2Go has been used to order food, medicine and taxis, as well as to make reservations at restaurants and beauty saloons.
startups.high_concept: Online Ordering, Reservations and Reports Via Social Media

startups.name: Pikster
startups.product_desc:
Pikster is a new way to discover, rate and share your favorite things in life.

We provide reliable, user generated reviews for your local businesses, products and services. Our social platform redefines the reviewing experience that allows consumers to rate their everyday interactions with local businesses for free.

Pikster provides a direct connection based on tastes and preferences between businesses and their target market, allowing brands to advertise specific products accordingly.

startups.name: pet n'GO
startups.product_desc: pet n'GO is an online e-tailer in Mexico focusing on all natural and healthy products. Accesories, toys and other products are 100% verified to be high quality and durable. Same day shipping on orders placed before 1:00 pm.

status.message: Made a deal to be in Cesar's Millan Mexico Magazine for 1 year

startups.name: Social Point
startups.product_desc:
Our Platform lets brands & businesses integrate a real time social display that easily fits an event or website generating social interaction and engagement.

By the time a we have a connection withTwitter API & Instagram API producing a beautiful output of crowdsourced experience shared by attendees/fans. 

Our solutions has been widely focused on gathering public validation by being used in big events of all types such as music concerts, congresses, openings, hackathons and more. Also permanent installations in brand offices. Being a web app is capable of being used whenever you find a computer browser with internet.

Our advantages: highly experienced design & technical team, we're building over existing robust code bases and a framework; adding new features and scaling is "cheaper" and more sustainable. We're experienced in Digital Marketing but need to investment to explode this channel.

We have a deep understanding of UX & Branding and can take the concept to the next level.

startups.name: Pogen
startups.product_desc:
@ Pogen we offer people counting solutions for retail and shopping malls. We have developed our software for data analysis. 

Trough people counting our customers get data on how their customers behave regarding their visits:
Preferred times
Preferred days
Preferred entrance to a mall
Obtain conversion rates for retailers
and so on!

startups.name: Directbook
startups.product_desc:
Directbook lets you find information that you need when you need it! You perform a search on the platform and you can create an organized directory according to your preferences, unlike the algorithm of google or facebook that let you find information relating to your profile, we bet to have wide vision to the information on the web, this is a genuine interaction between consumers and businesses, a space properly focused on consumer relatioships and 100% functional. 
The problematic: when you found a useful web most of the times you have to write it down on a paper or if you like a web you should to mark as favorites, revolt with other information and hardly find her again, the solution: Directbook, one organized directory that you yourself can build or modify, so we are sure of the potential of this project, creating a very useful tool that organizes, categorizes and find useful information for lives of thousands of people, expansion plan to all Mexico, starting up from Monterrey.

startups.name: Innventu
startups.product_desc:
Innventu is a Start-up focused on the development of innovating solutions for SMEs and government. Our business model includes three business lines, business webapps, on-demand developments and technology business consulting. We strive to create an ecosystem of flexible and accessible tools that work together to create value more for our customers.

Survmetrics is a web-based survey system with the geolocation API from HTML5. From the beginning Survmetrics was developed with flexibility and ease of use. We use several visualization tools and use diverse marketing and statistic theories to make said visualizations. We've proven it's potential in marketing, research, business analytics, and social communications.

Survmetrics is our first application, we are focused on the development of this app and other extensions for related markets.

startups.name: Solvantec
startups.product_desc:
Our main product, Sarani ERP, is an ERP (enterprise resource planning), MRP (manufacturing resource planning), and CRM (customer relationship management), or in other words, an administration, customer and production management system. It has been developed for companies that produce, distribute and/or commercialize products. It is a multi-lingual, multi-browser, multi-platform SAAS (software as a service) system, which the client pays for on a monthly basis to obtain access to the system. It is one of the easiest-to-use systems on the market with a really powerful engine.

We are currently on version 4.9 of our product. A demo of the latest version is available at https://www.saranierp.com
startups.high_concept: Sarani ERP: Simplify, control and grow your business

status.message: We have steadily been releasing new versions of Sarani ERP throughout the last 20 days. Right now the core functionality is bug-free, and we are working on new modules including the manufacturing and quality control modules. We hope to have new updates soon; please check our website and demo for more information: https://www.saranierp.com
